description.raw:
This PRs implements a time framework to obtain time measure in the release-tools jenkins scripts. As a test case, I modified sdformat (chroot and docker) to use this new functions.

It creates a [directory in the jenkins workspace](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64_test_timing_4/ws/timing/) ($WORKSPACE/timing) and populates:

 * A csv file to be used by the plot plugin with all the data (aggregate).
 * One csv file for each stopwatch created.

The [testing example](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/sdformat-any-devel-trusty-amd64_test_timing_4/plot/) compares chroot (runs 1 and 2) and docker (runs 3-6, 5-6 fixed a problem with the total time timer).
description.html:

It creates a directory in the jenkins workspace ($WORKSPACE/timing) and populates:

  • A csv file to be used by the plot plugin with all the data (aggregate).
  • One csv file for each stopwatch created.

The testing example compares chroot (runs 1 and 2) and docker (runs 3-6, 5-6 fixed a problem with the total time timer).
